testcase.name: Automate End to End Buy Order functionality
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Techlistic Login page......................................passed When User clicks on sign in providing Username and Password.................passed Then User is on Homepage....................................................passed When User clicks on T-Shirts submenu under Womens menu......................passed Then User is on T-Shirts list page..........................................passed When User clicks on More button on 1st T-Shirt..............................passed Then User is on customize product page......................................passed When User adds T-Shirt by customizing and clicks on checkout................passed Then User is on Checkout page...............................................passed When User Checkout the T-Shirt by confirming................................passed Then user should see Order Confirmation message.............................passed
